duties_responsibilities.duty: Troubleshoot, maintain, repair, and modify automotive manufacturing and test equipment to improve systems' uptime and reliability.
Oversee equipment modifications for process changes, new models, and expansions.
Maintain and update all process documentation, demonstrating knowledge and ability to employ safe work practices.

education_certification.credential: Associate Degree in a technical manufacturing discipline and 2 years automation/PLC controls with industrial maintenance and mechanical, electronic systems and PC controls, OR High School Diploma/GED and 2 years technical maintenance experience plus 2 years automation/PLC controls with industrial maintenance and mechanical, electronic systems and PC control - Total 4 years of Experience.
